comments:
Setting up a JRE for J9, I was typing in the location of the JRE as "d:\". I 
got an error dialog with "An internal error has occurred: String index of out 
range: 0. See error log for more details".

The error log:

This is a core bug. We create a path that has two slashes: "d:\\ive". This 
creates a segment with length 0, that is not accounted for in Path.canonicalize
().

Assigning to Platform/Core

Added regression test, but fix already released.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 6353 ***
